name: Back to school 1.01 (not educational)
description:
This game is made by a student developer, and is 10 minutes long. 

There will only be one boss available, but this will be updated from time to time. 

Also I consider this game to be pretty difficult,  just like school in real life.

All of the artworks, programming, soundtracks and designs were made by 314programs, and is copyrighted.

Please tell me bugs, or feedbacks in the comments.

For more information about the game, visit my youtube channel to take a look at further developments, updates, and soundtracks.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUEAg1WH5I6W_R06P1X6Igg

Enjoy the game.
